meanings.definition: Suitable for chewing or eating with a crunching sound.
meanings.sent1: The chips were so munchable that they made a loud crunch when I bit into them.
meanings.sent2: The fresh apples were so munchable that everyone enjoyed snacking on them.
meanings.sent3: The munchable popcorn made a delightful crunching sound at the movie night.
meanings.sent4: The munchable crackers were like crispy clouds in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The munchable carrots were as satisfying to eat as they were crunchy.

meanings.definition: Capable of being easily consumed or enjoyed.
meanings.sent1: The small candies were so munchable that they disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream was so munchable that it melted in my mouth instantly.
meanings.sent3: The munchable cookies were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The music was so munchable that it lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The story was as munchable as a delicious treat, easy to enjoy.
